markdown.markdown:
My mission is to make **complicated ideas** clear and **easy to understand**. My work is dedicated to creating meaningful information from data and to make information **accessible to everyone**. I do this with data analysis and visualisation, as well as through creating educational materials on marine ecology topics (and others!).

I am based in Barcelona but I work everywhere.

Feel free to contact me.

[![tweet me](images/Twitter%20social%20icons%20-%20circle%20-%20blue.png){alt="tweet me" width="30"}](https://twitter.com/shira_salin) [![check my github](images/GitHub-Mark-120px-plus.png){alt="check my github" width="30"}](https://github.com/shirasal) [![my linkedin](images/LI-In-Bug.png){alt="my linkedin" width="30" height="26"}](https://www.linkedin.com/in/shira-salingre/)
